div.p: RAMILLIES a small village of Brabant, in the Netherlands, twelve miles north of Namur, and twenty-two southeast of Brussels. Long. 4.48. E. Lat. 50.51. N. Itisfamous for the battle fought by the allies commanded by the Duke of Marlborough and M. dâ€™Auverquerque, against that of the two crowns, commanded by the Duke of Bavaria and Marshal Villeroi, on the 22d of May 1706.
